group_1.textLeft: How you guys doing?

group_1.textRight: Are you, by any chance...

group_1.textLeft: A Magical Girl? You betcha!@I'm Himika Mao!
Are you three all Magical Girls then?@Are you sisters?

group_1.textRight: Well, not by blood, but we've lived@together for a really long time.
I'm Hazuki Yusa.
My name is Konoha Shizumi.

group_1.textLeft: Nice to meet you.

group_1.textRight: Meee too, me too! I'm Ayame!@Good to meetcha!

group_1.textLeft: Wow, you're happy to meet me, huh?![chara:302001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock][chara:302001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302001:cheek_0][chara:302001:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302001:lipSynch_1]@I don't know why, but that makes me happy!

group_1.textRight: Ya got any sisters? You an only child?

group_1.textLeft: I'm the big sister! I have a bunch of@little sisters and brothers. Six of 'em!

group_1.textRight: Whaaaaaat! That's one huge family!@Awesome!
I'm so jealous! What's it like bein' a@big sis?

group_1.textLeft: Oh man, it's definitely not easy! But@every last one of 'em is sooo cute!
Konoha would say the same, right?

group_1.textRight: Ah, um... Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*
You know, just from lookin' at you, Himika,@I can tell you're the big sister.
You're way more on top of things than@Ayame is.

group_1.textRight: Mnnnghhh!
Aaanyway!  I'd love to meet your family,@Himika!
I'd like to try bein' a big sister!

group_1.textLeft: Why don't you come over now, then?@It's pretty cramped and messy, though!

group_1.textRight: [chara:302801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wow, wow, wow! For real?! [chara:302800:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302801:cheek_0][chara:302801:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302801:motion_100][chara:302801:lipSynch_1]YAAAAAAY!

group_1.textLeft: I was just heading back to make dinner@so why don't you come over to eat?
I'm so excited that I made some new friends!

group_1.textRight: Are you the one who cooks in your house,@Himika?

group_1.textLeft: Yep! I'm the one making food for the@whole family!

group_1.textRight: The whole family... Do they finish it all?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, for sure! Not a crumb left!

group_1.textRight: (Himika... She must be one magnificent@cook!)
Would it be okay if I accompanied Ayame@to your house as her guardian?
I'd like to make sure that she behaves@herself...

group_1.textLeft: You kidding? If anyone's going to be@misbehaving, it'll be my crazy family.
But sure! We'd be happy to have you@too, Konoha!

group_1.textRight: All right, I'll go home and make some@dinner...
If you guys end up eating at Himika's place,@I'll save the leftovers for breakfast.

group_1.textLeft: Whoa, we've never done that once in@my house. No such thing as leftovers!

group_1.textRight: See ya 'round, Hazuki! Off we go, go, go!
Sorry for imposing on you all of a@sudden.

group_1.textLeft: No problem! Here we are, come right in!
